subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tyler Bozak scored two goals and added an assist, and Tim Connolly had a goal and two assists to lead the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs to a 7-1 victory over the Tampa Bay Lightning.
snippet: Tyler Bozak scored two goals and added an assist, and Tim Connolly had a goal and two assists to lead the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs to a 7-1 victory over the Tampa Bay Lightning.
